name: Night Car Simulator 🌃
description:
It's recommended to play before sleep with headphones on.

A relaxing driving simulation game with no story where you drive down an endless road in a first-person perspective, you have control over engine, gas and brake pedal, windshield wiper and camera limited to cockpit and dashcam view.

The road trip itself is a one direction dirt path as you go through the randomly generated buildings and mountains with different times of the day and weather cycle.

Overall simple but realistic graphics and no death so you can enjoy a fearless relaxing trip, Have fun :)
